AT.name: EarthBound™
AT.description: Als ein Meteorit in der Nähe von Ness’ Haus einschlägt, macht der mutige Junge sich auf, um Näheres herauszufinden. Er ahnt ja nicht, dass dies der Anfang eines epischen Abenteuers ist, das sein Leben auf den Kopf stellen wird … ach ja, und möglicherweise rettet er nebenbei auch noch das Universum! Nach der Begegnung mit einem seltsamen Außerirdischen muss Ness die gesamte Welt bereisen, um Giygas, den Universellen Kosmischen Zerstörer, daran zu hindern, alles und jeden zu zerstören. Auf seiner Mission stehen ihm drei Freunde zur Seite. Nur durch den gemeinsamen Einsatz ihrer Fähigkeiten können die Freunde gegen den mächtigen Giygas bestehen! Dank der fesselnden Handlung, der detailreichen Welt und der zahlreichen einzigartigen Funktionen ist „EarthBound“ ein packendes, episches RPG. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

CA.name: EarthBound™
CA.description: Intergalactic terror strikes the small town of Onett as a blazing extraterrestrial object crashes in the night! The Earth now faces imminent destruction by the universal evil threat, Giygas. A courageous boy named Ness, and his three friends, vow to save the planet from hideous destruction! Battle hundreds of off-the-wall monsters, roaming dinosaurs and alien enemies! Journey to exotic locations like Saturn Valley, Dusty Dunes Desert, and Deep Darkness. The ultimate test lies in the impending encounter with the all-powerful Giygas!

AU.name: EarthBound™
AU.description: When a meteorite hits the Earth near to Ness’ house, the brave young man sets off to investigate, but little does he know that he’s about to begin an epic adventure that will change his life… oh, and he might just save the universe in the process! Ness will have to travel across the world after meeting with a strange alien in order to prevent Giygas, the Universal Cosmic Destroyer, from annihilating everything and everyone. He will be aided in his mission by three friends, and only by using their abilities and powers together do they stand a chance against the mighty Giygas! With a deeply engaging storyline, a richly detailed world and a wealth of unique features, EarthBound is an in-depth role-playing epic. This is the US version of the game.

BR.name: EarthBound™
BR.description: O terror intergaláctico toma conta da pequena cidade de Onett enquanto objetos extraterrestres incandescentes caem durante a noite! A Terra agora enfrenta a ameaça de destruição iminente, por parte do malvado Giygas. Um menino corajoso chamado Ness, e seus 3 amigos, prometem salvar o planeta desta terrível destruição! Lute contra centenas de monstros maníacos, dinossauros que perambulam pela Terra e alienígenas inimigos! Visite lugares exóticos, como Saturn Valley, Dusty Dunes Desert, e Deep Darkness. O teste supremo será o encontro com o poderoso Giygas!

BE.name: EarthBound™
BE.description: Quand une météorite s'écrase sur Terre à proximité de chez Ness, le jeune homme décide courageusement de mener l'enquête, sans savoir qu'il se lance dans une aventure épique qui changera le cours de sa vie... et l'amènera peut-être à sauver l'univers, au passage ! Après avoir rencontré un étrange extraterrestre, Ness devra voyager à travers le monde pour empêcher Giygas, le Destructeur cosmique universel, d'annihiler toute forme de vie. Ness sera aidé dans sa mission par trois amis, et ce n'est qu'en associant leurs aptitudes et leurs pouvoirs respectifs qu'ils auront une chance de vaincre le terrible Giygas ! Un scénario palpitant, un univers riche et fouillé et de nombreuses caractéristiques originales font d'Earthbound un jeu de rôle épique et passionnant. Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

BG.name: EarthBound™
BG.description: When a meteorite hits the Earth near to Ness’ house, the brave young man sets off to investigate, but little does he know that he’s about to begin an epic adventure that will change his life… oh, and he might just save the universe in the process! Ness will have to travel across the world after meeting with a strange alien in order to prevent Giygas, the Universal Cosmic Destroyer, from annihilating everything and everyone. He will be aided in his mission by three friends, and only by using their abilities and powers together do they stand a chance against the mighty Giygas! With a deeply engaging storyline, a richly detailed world and a wealth of unique features, EarthBound is an in-depth role-playing epic. This is the US version of the game.

IT.name: EarthBound™
IT.description: Quando un meteorite cade vicino a casa sua, il giovane Ness decide di indagare, ma non sa che sta per iniziare un'epica avventura destinata a cambiargli la vita… e che tra una cosa e l'altra potrebbe anche capitargli di salvare l'universo! Ness dovrà viaggiare in lungo e in largo dopo aver incontrato uno strano alieno per impedire a Giygas, il Distruttore cosmico universale, di annientare tutto e tutti. Ness sarà aiutato nella sua missione da tre amici e solo usando i loro poteri e le loro abilità insieme potrà sperare di avere la meglio sul malvagio Giygas! Con una trama profonda e appassionante, un mondo iperdettagliato e un'infinità di caratteristiche uniche, EarthBound è un gioco di ruolo epico che ti saprà conquistare. Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

DE.name: EarthBound™
DE.description: Als ein Meteorit in der Nähe von Ness’ Haus einschlägt, macht der mutige Junge sich auf, um Näheres herauszufinden. Er ahnt ja nicht, dass dies der Anfang eines epischen Abenteuers ist, das sein Leben auf den Kopf stellen wird … ach ja, und möglicherweise rettet er nebenbei auch noch das Universum! Nach der Begegnung mit einem seltsamen Außerirdischen muss Ness die gesamte Welt bereisen, um Giygas, den Universellen Kosmischen Zerstörer, daran zu hindern, alles und jeden zu zerstören. Auf seiner Mission stehen ihm drei Freunde zur Seite. Nur durch den gemeinsamen Einsatz ihrer Fähigkeiten können die Freunde gegen den mächtigen Giygas bestehen! Dank der fesselnden Handlung, der detailreichen Welt und der zahlreichen einzigartigen Funktionen ist „EarthBound“ ein packendes, episches RPG. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

ES.name: EarthBound™
ES.description: Cuando un meteorito se estrella contra la Tierra cerca de la casa de Ness, nuestro joven héroe se dispone a investigar; lo que no se imagina es que está a punto de emprender una aventura épica que cambiará su vida... ¡y de la que dependerá la salvación del universo! Tras un encuentro con un extraño alienígena, Ness viajará por el mundo para evitar que Giygas, el destructor cósmico universal, aniquile todo y a todos. En su misión contará con la ayuda de tres amigos; ¡solo utilizando juntos sus distintas habilidades y poderes podrán triunfar contra el poderoso Giygas! Con una trama que engancha, un mundo con profusión de detalles y un montón de funcionalidades únicas, EarthBound es una epopeya de gran profundidad. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

CY.name: EarthBound™
CY.description: When a meteorite hits the Earth near to Ness’ house, the brave young man sets off to investigate, but little does he know that he’s about to begin an epic adventure that will change his life… oh, and he might just save the universe in the process! Ness will have to travel across the world after meeting with a strange alien in order to prevent Giygas, the Universal Cosmic Destroyer, from annihilating everything and everyone. He will be aided in his mission by three friends, and only by using their abilities and powers together do they stand a chance against the mighty Giygas! With a deeply engaging storyline, a richly detailed world and a wealth of unique features, EarthBound is an in-depth role-playing epic. This is the US version of the game.

SE.name: EarthBound™
SE.description: When a meteorite hits the Earth near to Ness’ house, the brave young man sets off to investigate, but little does he know that he’s about to begin an epic adventure that will change his life… oh, and he might just save the universe in the process! Ness will have to travel across the world after meeting with a strange alien in order to prevent Giygas, the Universal Cosmic Destroyer, from annihilating everything and everyone. He will be aided in his mission by three friends, and only by using their abilities and powers together do they stand a chance against the mighty Giygas! With a deeply engaging storyline, a richly detailed world and a wealth of unique features, EarthBound is an in-depth role-playing epic. This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: EarthBound™
NL.description: Als een meteoriet inslaat in de buurt van het huis van Ness, trekt de dappere jonge aardbewoner erop uit om polshoogte te nemen. Hij weet echter niet dat dit het begin is van een episch avontuur dat zijn leven zal veranderen... o, en het zou best eens kunnen gebeuren dat hij ondertussen het universum redt! Ness moet na een ontmoeting met een vreemd buitenaards wezen rond de wereld reizen om te voorkomen dat 'Universal Cosmic Destroyer' Giygas alles en iedereen zal wegvagen, Ness krijgt hulp van drie vrienden en alleen door hun vaardigheden en krachten samen te gebruiken, maken ze een kans tegen de machtige Giygas! Met een diep, meeslepend verhaal, een gedetailleerde wereld en een weelde aan unieke mogelijkheden, is EartBound een epische, ongekend rijke RPG. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

PT.name: EarthBound™
PT.description: Quando um meteorito embate na Terra perto da casa de Ness, o corajoso jovem decide investigar o caso. Ness nem imagina que está prestes a iniciar uma aventura épica que mudará a sua vida... Ah, e talvez até salve o universo pelo caminho! Após ter-se cruzado com um bizarro extraterrestre, Ness terá de viajar à volta do mundo para impedir que Giygas, o Universal Cosmic Destroyer, aniquile tudo e todos. Nesta sua missão vai contar com a ajuda de três amigos e a única hipótese de derrotar o poderoso Giygas será fazer uso das habilidades e poderes de todos em conjunto! Com um enredo profundamente cativante, um mundo rico em pormenores e uma abundância de funcionalidades únicas, EarthBound é um RPG épico com uma profundidade única. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: EarthBound™
RU.description: Когда Ness отправляется исследовать метеорит, упавший на Землю возле его дома, он и не подозревает, что его ждет эпическое приключение, которое изменит его жизнь, а может, даже позволит между делом спасти вселенную! После встречи со странным пришельцем, Ness отправится в путешествие по всему миру. Ему предстоит остановить злобного Giygas, задумавшего уничтожить все и вся. Но Ness будет не один, в этом задании ему помогут трое друзей и только все вместе, используя все свои силы и способности, наши герои смогут противостоять мощи злодея! Глубокий, увлекательный сюжет, богатый и проработанный игровой мир и изобилие уникальных возможностей делают EarthBound по-настоящему эпическим ролевым приключением. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

PL.name: EarthBound™
PL.description: When a meteorite hits the Earth near to Ness’ house, the brave young man sets off to investigate, but little does he know that he’s about to begin an epic adventure that will change his life… oh, and he might just save the universe in the process! Ness will have to travel across the world after meeting with a strange alien in order to prevent Giygas, the Universal Cosmic Destroyer, from annihilating everything and everyone. MX.name: EarthBound™
MX.description: Un terror intergaláctico se apodera del pueblo de Onett cuando un objeto incendiario extraterrestre cae a la tierra por la noche, y ahora el malvado Giygas amenaza con la destrucción total del planeta. Un valiente muchacho llamado Ness y sus tres amigos se empeñan en salvar al planeta de este terrible fin. ¡Enfréntate a cientos de monstruos disparatados, dinosaurios errantes y enemigos extraterrestres! Viaja a lugares exóticos como Saturn Valley, Dusty Dunes Desert y Deep Darkness. ¡La prueba final será el enfrentamiento con el mismísimo Giygas!
